changeSet.author: nebay
changeSet.comment: Copy tags from docTag into tagMetaData when tagMetaData is NULL or empty.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE StructuredDocument SET tagMetaData = docTag WHERE (tagMetaData IS NULL OR tagMetaData = '') AND docTag IS NOT NULL;
UPDATE StructuredDocument_AUD SET tagMetaData = docTag WHERE (tagMetaData IS NULL OR tagMetaData = '') AND docTag IS NOT NULL;
